TopicTitle: Reasons on why we should stop developing space

Articles.Content:
It's simple. You post a humorous and nonsensical reason on why we should stop the development of space, and another person does the exact same thing, accompanied with a equally silly critique on the reason which the previous person posted.

Here's an example:

We should stop developing space because it will leave debris in earth orbit, which will eventually blot out the sun!
(We can deal with space debris, you know. We can use a space vacuum or something.)

We shouldn't develop space because it will make rare ores cheap and endanger the ore trade!

And so on.

If you have any questions regarding what to do in this game, post in this thread or send a private message.

We should stop developing in space because when we meet advanced lifeforms, they will take one look at facebook and decide that the human race does not deserve to live.

also #YOLO
we should stop developing space because if anyone dies there, the US will make the UN ban space travel anyway

You people should stop developing space because I claimed it years ago.

My flag is up there, somewhere. If you can find it. Trust me.

Aliens can be dealt with using proper gifts. I mean, every alien needs a sweater, right?

We really shouldn't go to space because it's too hard!
